// Restricted // 
NO.CAS-8(4)/2009/DIV.I(Vehicle) 
GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
BUREAU OF CIVIL AVIATION SECURITY 
(MINISTRY OF CIVIL AVIATION) 
A’ WING JANPATH BHAWAN 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI 
Dated:   21-01-2011 
 
 
AVSEC CIRCULAR  NO. 03 / 2011 
 
 
Subject :   Facility of access of vehicles up to tarmac of airports for all former 
Civil Aviation Ministers still serving as Union Ministers. 
 
 
 
        
In continuation to BCAS Circular No. 36/2005, dated 30-08-2005, the 
facility of access of vehicle up to tarmac of airports, to the extent possible, may 
also be extended to all former Civil Aviation Ministers still serving as Union 
Ministers. 
 
 
 
 
 
 ( R.N.Dhoke, IPS )  
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution as per list attached/ overleaf. 
 
 
Copy to: 
 
 
1. 
MCA ( Shri S.Gowri Shankar, Under Secretary), R.G.Bhawan, New Delhi.                                          
            : w.r.t MCA letter  No.AV.13024/37/2003-SS dated 21/01/2011
